statements: SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_name FROM customer_profiles WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customer_profiles WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE age >= 25 ORDER BY customer_name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM customer_profiles WHERE age < 25;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, destination, travel_date FROM travel_preferences WHERE destination = 'Paris';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, budget, preference_description FROM travel_preferences WHERE budget >= 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, destination, travel_date FROM travel_preferences WHERE budget > 500.00;
SELECT customer_id, preference_description FROM travel_preferences WHERE destination = 'Japan';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles cp JOIN travel_preferences tp ON cp.customer_id = tp.customer_id;

SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT name, destination, budget FROM customer_profiles JOIN travel_preferences ON customer_profiles.customer_id = travel_preferences.customer_id WHERE budget < 1000;
